sense.name: hurt, feel physical pain
sense.examples: John's broken arm ached dully. The child's body was aching after the accident. His whole body ached. Arthritis caused his knees to ache. The bruise ached constantly.

sense.name: desire someone or something not present
sense.examples: Her heart ached for her boyfriend when they were apart. His death made their hearts ache with loneliness. After she quit smoking, she ached for a cigarrette when stressed. The children ached for their father to return from the war. Young idealists ache to do good in the world.
